name: Untitled TD
description:
Untitled Tower Defense

It's my second casual game in itch.io. This game is a submission for Blackthornprod Game Jam. This game is about a little soldier protect his HQ from a devil. As a player you can control him to building a Defense Tower, Resource building and Shooting enemy with your gun. 

Team : 
  • Programmer : Grailgun
  • Art : Jemp and Ledvhig
Free asset :
  • Low swordsman 2D from unity asset store
How To Play :
  • Move with W-A-S-D
  • Shoot with mouse
  • Press 1, 2, 3 or 4 to buy a building
  • Press F to place building
  • Press R to rotate building
